def_cn: (机械装置)装有发条的，用手柄操作的
def_en: A wind-up device is a mechanical device with a handle or key that you turn several times before you use it in order to make it work.

def_cn: 故意惹人生气的玩笑;故意戏弄人的把戏
def_en: A wind-up is a joke or trick in which someone deliberately tells you something untrue in order to annoy you.
